org.apache.flink.runtime.jobmanager.slots

接口 TaskManagerGateway

  • 所有已知实现类:
    ActorTaskManagerGateway, RpcTaskManagerGateway

    public interface TaskManagerGateway
    Task manager gateway interface to communicate with the task manager.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      Cancel the given task.

      Disconnect the task manager from the job manager.
      void failPartition(ExecutionAttemptID executionAttemptID)
      Fail all intermediate result partitions of the given task.

      Return the address of the task manager with which the gateway is associated.

      Notify the given task about a completed checkpoint.

      Request the stack trace from the task manager.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getAddress

        java.lang.String getAddress()
        Return the address of the task manager with which the gateway is associated.
        返回:
        Address of the task manager with which this gateway is associated.

      • disconnectFromJobManager

        void disconnectFromJobManager(InstanceID instanceId,
                              java.lang.Exception cause)
        Disconnect the task manager from the job manager.
        参数:
        instanceId - identifying the task manager
        cause - of the disconnection

      • stopCluster

        void stopCluster(ApplicationStatus applicationStatus,
                 java.lang.String message)
        Stop the cluster.
        参数:
        applicationStatus - to stop the cluster with
        message - to deliver

      • requestStackTrace

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<StackTrace> requestStackTrace(Time timeout)
        Request the stack trace from the task manager.
        参数:
        timeout - for the stack trace request
        返回:
        Future for a stack trace

      • requestStackTraceSample

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<StackTraceSampleResponse> requestStackTraceSample(ExecutionAttemptID executionAttemptID,
                                                                                         int sampleId,
                                                                                         int numSamples,
                                                                                         Time delayBetweenSamples,
                                                                                         int maxStackTraceDepth,
                                                                                         Time timeout)
        Request a stack trace sample from the given task.
        参数:
        executionAttemptID - identifying the task to sample
        sampleId - of the sample
        numSamples - to take from the given task
        delayBetweenSamples - to wait for
        maxStackTraceDepth - of the returned sample
        timeout - of the request
        返回:
        Future of stack trace sample response

      • submitTask

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Acknowledge> submitTask(TaskDeploymentDescriptor tdd,
                                                               Time timeout)
        Submit a task to the task manager.
        参数:
        tdd - describing the task to submit
        timeout - of the submit operation
        返回:
        Future acknowledge of the successful operation

      • stopTask

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Acknowledge> stopTask(ExecutionAttemptID executionAttemptID,
                                                             Time timeout)
        Stop the given task.
        参数:
        executionAttemptID - identifying the task
        timeout - of the submit operation
        返回:
        Future acknowledge if the task is successfully stopped

      • cancelTask

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Acknowledge> cancelTask(ExecutionAttemptID executionAttemptID,
                                                               Time timeout)
        Cancel the given task.
        参数:
        executionAttemptID - identifying the task
        timeout - of the submit operation
        返回:
        Future acknowledge if the task is successfully canceled

      • updatePartitions

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Acknowledge> updatePartitions(ExecutionAttemptID executionAttemptID,
                                                                     java.lang.Iterable<PartitionInfo> partitionInfos,
                                                                     Time timeout)
        Update the task where the given partitions can be found.
        参数:
        executionAttemptID - identifying the task
        partitionInfos - telling where the partition can be retrieved from
        timeout - of the submit operation
        返回:
        Future acknowledge if the partitions have been successfully updated

      • failPartition

        void failPartition(ExecutionAttemptID executionAttemptID)
        Fail all intermediate result partitions of the given task.
        参数:
        executionAttemptID - identifying the task

      • notifyCheckpointComplete

        void notifyCheckpointComplete(ExecutionAttemptID executionAttemptID,
                              JobID jobId,
                              long checkpointId,
                              long timestamp)
        Notify the given task about a completed checkpoint.
        参数:
        executionAttemptID - identifying the task
        jobId - identifying the job to which the task belongs
        checkpointId - of the completed checkpoint
        timestamp - of the completed checkpoint

      • triggerCheckpoint

        void triggerCheckpoint(ExecutionAttemptID executionAttemptID,
                       JobID jobId,
                       long checkpointId,
                       long timestamp,
                       CheckpointOptions checkpointOptions)
        Trigger for the given task a checkpoint.
        参数:
        executionAttemptID - identifying the task
        jobId - identifying the job to which the task belongs
        checkpointId - of the checkpoint to trigger
        timestamp - of the checkpoint to trigger
        checkpointOptions - of the checkpoint to trigger

      • requestTaskManagerLog

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<TransientBlobKey> requestTaskManagerLog(Time timeout)
        Request the task manager log from the task manager.
        参数:
        timeout - for the request
        返回:
        Future blob key under which the task manager log has been stored

      • requestTaskManagerStdout

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<TransientBlobKey> requestTaskManagerStdout(Time timeout)
        Request the task manager stdout from the task manager.
        参数:
        timeout - for the request
        返回:
        Future blob key under which the task manager stdout file has been stored
